title: Can we please allow Kled to recover Courage from Large Monsters?
body:
I'd just like to be able to play Jungle Kled, because it's a really fun way to play this already fun champion. 

Just asking for him to recover some Courage while attacking Large Monsters, like Brambleback and Golem. Probably at the same rate in which he recovers it from Epic Monsters.

~~Also Rito I want a Kled Emote where he just looks angry and yelling and one of Skaarl looking dumb as usual~~
